html_template:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>{title}</title>
    <style>
        body {{
            font-family: 'Georgia', serif;
            line-height: 1.6;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            color: #333;
            background-color: #f5f5f5;
        }}
        
        /* Настройки для печати */
        @page {{
            size: A4 portrait;
            margin: 0;
        }}
        
        @media print {{
            body, .cover-page, .content-page, .editors-page {{
                margin: 0;
                box-shadow: none;
                background: white;
            }}
            
            .cover-page, .content-page, .editors-page {{
                page-break-after: always;
                height: 297mm;
                width: 210mm;
            }}
            
            .editors-page:last-child {{
                page-break-after: auto;
            }}
        }}
        
        /* Общие стили для страниц */
        .magazine-page {{
            height: 297mm;
            width: 210mm;
            position: relative;
            background: white;
            overflow: hidden;
            box-sizing: border-box;
            margin: 1cm auto;
            box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
        }}
        
        /* Стили для обложки */
        .cover-page {{
            padding: 0;
        }}
        
        .cover-image {{
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            object-fit: cover;
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
        }}
        
        .cover-title {{
            position: absolute;
            top: 1cm;
            left: 0;
            right: 0;
            text-align: center;
            color: white;
            background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.7);
            padding: 20px;
        }}
        
        .title-line1 {{
            font-size: 36px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 2px;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            display: block;
        }}
        
        .title-line2 {{
            font-size: 24px;
            font-weight: normal;
            display: block;
            letter-spacing: 1px;
        }}
        
        /* Стили для контентных страниц */
        .content-page {{
            padding: 1.5cm 2cm 2cm 2cm;
        }}
        
        h1 {{
            color: #2c3e50;
            font-size: 26px;
            margin-top: 0;
            margin-bottom: 12px;
            padding-bottom: 8px;
            border-bottom: 2px solid #3498db;
        }}
        
        .article-image-container {{
            width: 100%;
            margin: 8px 0;
        }}
        
        .article-image {{
            width: 100%;
            display: block;
            border: 1px solid #ddd;
        }}
        
        .article-text {{
            margin: 12px 0 20px 0;
            font-size: 15px;
            line-height: 1.5;
        }}
        
        .editors-comment {{
            border: 1px solid #ddd;
            padding: 10px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            background-color: #f9f9f9;
            position: absolute;
            bottom: 2.5cm;
            left: 2cm;
            right: 2cm;
        }}
        
        .editors-photo {{
            width: 60px;
            height: 60px;
            border-radius: 3px;
            object-fit: cover;
            margin-right: 12px;
            border: 1px solid #ccc;
        }}
        
        .comment-text {{
            flex: 1;
            font-style: italic;
            color: #555;
            font-size: 13px;
        }}
        
        /* Стили для страницы редакторов */
        .editors-page {{
            padding: 2cm;
        }}
        
        .editors-title {{
            color: #2c3e50;
            font-size: 28px;
            margin-top: 0;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            padding-bottom: 10px;
            border-bottom: 2px solid #3498db;
            text-align: center;
        }}
        
        .editors-container {{
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            margin-top: 30px;
        }}
        
        .editor-profile {{
            width: 48%;
            text-align: center;
        }}
        
        .editor-photo {{
            width: 150px;
            height: 200px;
            object-fit: cover;
            border: 1px solid #ddd;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }}
        
        .editor-name {{
            font-weight: bold;
            font-size: 18px;
            margin-bottom: 5px;
        }}
        
        .editor-position {{
            font-style: italic;
            color: #3498db;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }}
        
        .editor-bio {{
            font-size: 14px;
            line-height: 1.5;
            text-align: left;
        }}
        
        /* CAM Publishing Note */
        .publishing-note {{
            position: absolute;
            bottom: 1cm;
            right: 2cm;
            text-align: right;
            font-size: 12px;
            color: #777;
            line-height: 1.4;
        }}
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    {cover_page}
    {content_pages}
    {editors_page}
</body>
</html>
editor_template:
{name}
{position}

{bio}
cover_page_template: {title_line1} {title_line2}
content_page_template:
{title}

{text}

"{editor_comment}"
